SystemDefaultLocaleMapping

The LocaleMapping that most closely matches the SystemUICulture, or null iff locales is empty.

public LocaleMapping? SystemDefaultLocaleMapping { get; }

Property Value

LocaleMapping

Remarks

This property is cached.

Methods

AddLanguage(string, ILocalisationStore)

Add a single language to this manager.

public void AddLanguage(string language, ILocalisationStore storage)

Parameters

language string

The culture name to be added. Generally should match Name.

storage ILocalisationStore

A storage providing localisations for the specified language.

Remarks

Use AddLocaleMappings(IEnumerable<LocaleMapping>) as a more efficient way of bootstrapping all available locales.

AddLocaleMappings(IEnumerable<LocaleMapping>)

Add multiple locale mappings. Should be used to add all available languages at initialisation.

public void AddLocaleMappings(IEnumerable<LocaleMapping> mappings)

Parameters

mappings IEnumerable<LocaleMapping>

All available locale mappings.

GetLocalisedBindableString(LocalisableString)

Creates an ILocalisedBindableString which automatically updates its text according to information provided in Text.

public ILocalisedBindableString GetLocalisedBindableString(LocalisableString original)

Parameters

original LocalisableString

Returns

ILocalisedBindableString

The ILocalisedBindableString.

GetLocalisedString(LocalisableString)

Returns the appropriate string value for a LocalisableString given the currently valid LocalisationParameters.

public string GetLocalisedString(LocalisableString text)

Parameters

text LocalisableString

Returns

string

Remarks

The returned value is only valid until the next change to CurrentParameters. To facilitate tracking changes to the localised value across CurrentParameters changes, use GetLocalisedBindableString(LocalisableString) and subscribe to its ValueChanged instead.
